content.rendered:
Directed by Sundar C.

Written by Sundar C. Rishabh Purohit

Cast Sundar C.(Ravi). Arya(Saravanan). Raashi Khanna(Jyothi). Andrea Jeremiah(Eeshwari). Vivek(Sigamani). Yogi Babu(Abhishek). Sampath Raj(Rajasekhar). Sakshi Agarwal(Hema). Vela Ramamoorthy(Saamiyaadi). Vichu Vishwanath(Kaali). Manobala(Pencil). Madhusudhan Rao(Vallimalai Swamiji). Amit Bhargav(Eeshwari’s Lover). Cell Murugan(Manickam). Vincent Ashokan(Durai). Nalini(Tiktok Sarala). Nandhini Myna(Mynavathi (Sigamani’s wife)). Kulappulli Leela(Valliamma (Cook)). Veronika Arora(Young Jyothi). Hariharan(Special Appearance). Shankar Mahadevan(Special Appearance). Tsr(Poojari)

Language Tamil

Producer Dhaval Pandya.

Production Avni Cinemax. Benzz Media. Goldmines Telefilms
